p: Biofilm is one of major factors that lowers the efficacy of antibacterial drugs. In a previous study, UNA showed antibiofilm activity of Staphylococcus aureus (82% inhibition at 100 µM), although it did not exert antibacterial activity compared to ULA [ 91]. UNA has relatively lower cytotoxicity against Vero monkey kidney cells (IC 50 > 100 µM), whereas ULA significantly reduced cell viability (IC 50 < 5 µM), indicating that UNA may be developed as a safer antibiofilm reagent [ 91].
